MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY18 postcode area of Llanidloes, affecting properties in Garden Suburb and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4.30PM to remove trees from our overhead lines. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 6.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.40PM on 16th February 2021
